description: Number of initial pieces needed to reach level n in the Solitaire Army game.
comments: Level 4 is the highest level that can be reached.
references: E. R. Berlekamp, J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, Winning Ways, Academic Press, NY, 2 vols., 1982, see p. 715.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Conway's Soldiers
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
